page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: Many people belong to the various clubs that are in our area (see under 'CLUBS') Most people here,as in all areas,spend time watching T.V.& videos & listening to the radio,record players,etc.; computer games are quite popular; people do needlework & have other hobbies;a mobile library comes once a week,riding is quite popular. People go out of the village for swimming, cinemas,theatres,etc,our nearest cinema is at Devizes our nearest theatre is at Bath;most nearby towns have public swimming pools & there are several private ones locally .There are sports centres in Trowbridge & Melksham.There is a pub in Steeple Ashton and in Great Hinton. Dances & discos are sometimes held in the village halls,there are several fetes in the area each year.
